availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition
Early Access

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

creation.placeName: San Francisco, San Francisco County, California

body.p:
State of California
City and County of San Francisco } S.S.

I, H. S. Homans duly appointed by the Governor of the State of Kentucky a Commissioner for the State of Callifornia Kentucky resident at the City and County of San Francisco State of California. do solemnly swear that I will well and faithfully execute and perform all the duties of such Commissioner under and by virtue of the laws of said State of Kentucky

Subscribed and Sworn to before me this 29th day of November AD 1864
Wm Loewy
County Clerk, ex officio Clerk of the 12th District Court in and for said County

California
Cmr Deeds
Oath of H. S. Homans
filed 6th Jany 1865
